string.value: To commemorate the 3 year anniversary of MapleStory, apparently there's going to be a huge event. I better go see #b#p9010000##k in town.

Hello! Can you believe it's been 3 years since you first visted the Maple World? To celebrate this momentous occasion, we planned a humongous bonanza for everyone. Would you like to join the fesitivities?

In order to join the MapleStory 3rd Anniversary Bonanza, you'll have to prove that you're indeed an adventurer in the Maple World. If you're a true adventurer, then you should have #b#t04031297##k. #b#t04031297##k looks like a red envelope with a leaf drawn onto it like this #i04031297#, and it can be found by defeating monsters. If you can find #b1 #t04031297##k from a monster and give it to me, then I'll let you in the party as well.
I really wish you could come and help celebrate the 3 year anniversary with us...

Did you bring #b#t04031297##k? Okay let me see... it is indeed the #b#t04031297##k for the MapleStory 3rd Anniversary Bonanza! Since you brought the invitation card, I'll give you #b#t01002508##k so you'll stand out more at the actual party.

Hopefully you like #b#t01002508##k. Wear #b#t01002508##k whenever you're participating in any of the events celebrating the #eMapleStory 3rd Anniversary#n. I haven't heard a word from her since, and that concerns me... Please go see her for me.
